official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to reimburse medicare beneficiaries who are entitled to status as qualified medicare beneficiaries under the medicaid program for medicare cost-sharing incurred by the beneficiaries that was not paid for under a State plan for medical assistance under title XIX of such Act.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to allow individuals to temporarily receive retroactive payments for any medical costs they incurred while eligible for enrollment in the Qualified Medicare Beneficiary Program.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to reimburse medicare beneficiaries who are entitled to status as qualified medicare beneficiaries under the medicaid program for medicare cost-sharing incurred by the beneficiaries that was not paid for under a State plan for medical assistance under title XIX of such Act.
